item.title: Java String Concat in Loop
item.description: 分析环境 jdk8 分析代码 public class StringConcat { public static void main(String[] args) { String s = "$"; for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) { s += i; } System.out.println(s); } } main 字节码 public static void main(java.lang.String[]); Code: 0: ldc #2 // String $ 2: astore_1 3: iconst_0 4: istore_2 5: iload_2 6: bipush 10 8: if_icmpge 36 11:
